xtream.core.commonconfig

Class CommonConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtream.core.commonconfig.CommonConfig

  • public class CommonConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides us with a simple tranparent mechanism to access config file

    • Method Detail

      • Initialize

        public static boolean Initialize(java.lang.String _configFileName)
        To initialize CommonConfig
        Parameters:
        _configFileName - config file addr and name (default addr is project root)
        Returns:
        true: initialized false: not initialized

      • GetConfigDoubleItem

        public static double GetConfigDoubleItem(java.lang.String itemName)
        To retrieve an double config item from config file
        Parameters:
        itemName - name of config item to retrieve
        Returns:
        on success: value of requested item on failure: 0 (+ log entry)
        See Also:
        GetConfigStrItem

      • GetConfigIntItem

        public static int GetConfigIntItem(java.lang.String itemName)
        To retrieve an int config item from config file
        Parameters:
        itemName - name of config item to retrieve
        Returns:
        on success: value of requested item on failure: 0 (+ log entry)
        See Also:
        GetConfigStrItem

      • GetConfigStrItem

        public static java.lang.String GetConfigStrItem(java.lang.String itemName)
        To retrieve a string config item from config file
        Parameters:
        itemName - name of config item to retrieve
        Returns:
        on success: value of requested item on failure: empty string (i.e. "") (+ log entry)
